org.transitime.ipc.interfaces

Interface PredictionsInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PredictionsServer

    public interface PredictionsInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Defines the RMI interface used for obtaining predictions.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PredictionsInterface.RouteStop
      This class is for use as key into hash maps that store prediction data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.util.List<Prediction>> get(java.util.List<PredictionsInterface.RouteStop> routeStops, int predictionsPerStop)
      For each route/stop specified returns a list of predictions for that stop.
      java.util.List<Prediction> get(java.lang.String routeShortName, java.lang.String stopId, int predictionsPerStop)
      Returns list of current predictions for the specified route/stop.

      For each route/stop specified returns a list of predictions for that stop.

        routeShortName -

      • get

        java.util.List<java.util.List<Prediction>> get(java.util.List<PredictionsInterface.RouteStop> routeStops,
                                             int predictionsPerStop)
                                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        For each route/stop specified returns a list of predictions for that stop. Since expensive RMI calls are being done this method is much more efficient for obtaining multiple predictions then if a separate get() call is done for each route/stop.
        Parameters:
        routeStops - List of route/stops to return predictions for
        predictionsPerStop - Max number of predictions to return per route/stop
        Returns:
        List of List of PredictionsInterface for the route/stop.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getUsingRouteId

        java.util.List<java.util.List<Prediction>> getUsingRouteId(java.util.List<PredictionsInterface.RouteStop> routeStops,
                                                         int predictionsPerStop)
                                                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        For each route/stop specified returns a list of predictions for that stop. Since expensive RMI calls are being done this method is much more efficient for obtaining multiple predictions then if a separate get() call is done for each route/stop.
        Parameters:
        routeStops - List of route/stops to return predictions for
        predictionsPerStop - Max number of predictions to return per route/stop
        Returns:
        List of List of PredictionsInterface for the route/stop.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
